titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, at Sherauz [Shiraz] to Captain M E Bagnold, Field Paymaster, Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of receipts for remittances made by the Paymaster to British forces at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū]. It further informs Captain Bagnold that the Linguist and the Broker have been given instructions to respond his requests during the Resident's absence from Bushire.
